listeningQuestion.question: When was Ted's bicycle stolen?
listeningQuestion.translation: 泰德的自行车是什么时候被偷的？

content.editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个关于失而复得的有趣故事，展示了警察工作的效率。课文使用了被动语态和一些重要的语法结构，如'be being done'的现在进行时被动语态等。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: Ted Robinson has been worried all the week.
Last Tuesday he received a letter from the local police.
In the letter he was asked to call at the station.
Ted wondered why he was wanted by the police, but he went to the station yesterday and now he is not worried any more.
At the station, he was told by a smiling policeman that his bicycle had been found.
Five days ago, the policeman told him, the bicycle was picked up in a small village four hundred miles away.
It is now being sent to his home by train.
Ted was most surprised when he heard the news.
He was amused too, because he never expected the bicycle to be found.
It was stolen twenty years ago when Ted was a boy of fifteen!

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 泰德·鲁宾逊焦虑了整整一个星期。
上星期二他收到当地警察局的一封信。
信中要他到警察局去一趟。
泰德奇怪警察为什么找他，但昨天还是去了，结果他不再担心了。
在警察局里，一位面带笑容的警察告诉他，他的自行车找到了。
那位警察对他说，那辆自行车是5天前在400英里外的一个小村里发现的。
现在正用火车给他运回家来。
泰德听到这个消息后，惊奇万分。
他也觉得非常好笑，因为他从未指望那辆自行车还能找到。
这是20年前泰德还是一个15岁的孩子时被人偷走的！

newwords.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

notes.title: 被动语态的现在进行时
content: 结构为'am/is/are + being + 过去分词'
例句：It is now being sent to his home by train.
表示动作正在进行，且主语是动作的承受者。

notes.title: most的用法
content: 作为副词时，表示'非常，很'，常与形容词性的过去分词连用。
例句：Ted was most surprised when he heard the news.
不加the时译为'非常'，加the时才译为'最'

notes.title: call相关短语
content: call at: 拜访某地（如call at the station）

notes.title: 被动语态中的want
content: want用于被动语态时可表示'想与某人见面'或'缉拿，追捕'
例句：Ted wondered why he was wanted by the police.
常用于正式场合或警务情境

notes.translation: （偶然地、意外地）找到、获得、学会
notes.context: 表示意外发现或获得某物
notes.example: The bicycle was picked up in a small village.

notes.context: 表示某事不再发生或继续
notes.example: He is not worried any more.

notes.context: 表示距离，可直接作定语
notes.example: The bicycle was found in a village four hundred miles away.

notes.context: 表示特定地区的警察机构
notes.example: He received a letter from the local police.

multipleChoice.question: Why was Ted worried at first?
options: Because he received a letter from the police
Because he had to go to the station
Because he was late for work
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文提到Ted收到警察局的信后一直很担心（worried）。

multipleChoice.question: How long ago was the bicycle stolen?
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文最后提到自行车是在20年前被偷的。

multipleChoice.question: How far away was the village where the bicycle was found?
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文提到自行车是在400英里外的村子里被发现的。

fillInBlanks.sentence: Ted _____ why he was wanted by the police.
The bicycle is now _____ sent to his home by train.
fillInBlanks.hint: 用于构成现在进行时的被动语态

notes.title: 词语辨析
notes.content: quick（动作快）、fast（速度快）、soon（时间快）这三个词都表示'快'，但使用场景不同。如quick meal（快餐）、fast food（快餐）、see you soon（很快见）。

notes.title: 地址缩写
notes.content: 英语中常见的地址缩写：St.(Street), Rd.(Road), Sq.(Square), Ave.(Avenue), Pl.(Place)等。但Lane和Drive通常不缩写。

notes.title: 语言特点
notes.content: 本课使用了大量的被动语态，这是因为故事的主人公是事件的被动接受者，而不是主动的行为者。这种写作手法突出了故事的戏剧性和意外性。
